description:
Recycling looks good on you. The Bottle Source collection diverts single use plastic bottles from the waste streams of the world (here the Himalayan foothills) and recycles them into hoodies, tees and totes.Fabric blend is soft, wicks moisture and resists wrinkles.Regular fit

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: The North Face Himalayan Bottle Source Short-Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
